Body:
c_old = np.array([9.0, 10.0, 11.0])
Delta_old = 200.0
Delta_new = 200.0
c_new = ccl.halos.massdef.convert_concentration(COSMO, c_old, Delta_old,
    Delta_new)
assert np.all(c_old == c_new)
Delta_new = 500.0
c_new = ccl.halos.massdef.convert_concentration(COSMO, c_old, Delta_old,
    Delta_new)
c_new_expected = np.array([6.12194, 6.82951, 7.53797])
assert np.all(np.fabs(c_new / c_new_expected - 1) < 0.0001)
